categories.name: Combat
categories.definition: Tags related to martial actions and conflict resolution.

categories.name: Offensive
categories.definition: Tags that describe actions meant to harm or weaken opponents.

categories.name: Gameplay
categories.definition: Tags that identify structural or mechanical features of play.

categories.name: Debuff
categories.definition: Tags that apply negative effects or hinder an opponent.

categories.name: Defensive
categories.definition: Tags that mitigate harm, protect, or resist hostile actions.

categories.name: Social
categories.definition: Tags tied to interaction, influence, and negotiation.

categories.name: General
categories.definition: Tags of broad scope that do not fit specialized categories.

categories.name: Exploration
categories.definition: Tags that involve discovery, movement, and survival in the environment.

categories.name: Magic
categories.definition: Tags linked to supernatural forces and arcane effects.

categories.name: Meta
categories.definition: Tags concerning rule structure, categories, or systemic layers of play.

categories.name: Utility
categories.definition: Tags that provide practical benefits or versatile functions outside combat.

tags.name: Arcane
tags.definition: Relates to magic derived from study, runes, or eldritch sources.
interactions: Often interacts with glyphs or rituals

tags.name: Area
tags.definition: Affects multiple targets within a defined space.

tags.name: Attack
tags.definition: An offensive action aimed at a target through weapons, unarmed force, or indirect effects.
interactions: Affected by talents that boost damage
tags.notes: Core mechanical tag. Often used to determine legality of abilities.

tags.name: Cold
tags.definition: Causes chilling, freezing, or slowing effects.

tags.name: Combat
tags.definition: Direct engagement in battle — striking, defending, clashing with steel or spell, and enduring the violence of conflict.
interactions: Affected by talents that boost damage
tags.notes: Core mechanical tag. Often used to determine legality of abilities.

tags.name: Control
tags.definition: Alters battlefield conditions or restricts enemy actions.
interactions: Creates zones, barriers, or area effects

tags.name: Debuff
tags.definition: Applies penalties or hindrances to enemies.

tags.name: Defense
tags.definition: Enhances your resistance, armor, or ability to avoid harm.

tags.name: Divine
tags.definition: Relates to sacred power, faith, or blessings.

tags.name: Exploration
tags.definition: Discovery through the unknown — navigating terrain, perceiving hidden details, surviving hazards, and unveiling secrets of the land.
tags.notes: Core mechanical tag. Often used to determine legality of abilities.

tags.name: Fire
tags.definition: An action that employs flame as its destructive element, causing burning, igniting, or spreading fire.

tags.name: Instant
tags.definition: The effect resolves immediately, with no duration.

tags.name: Lightning
tags.definition: Delivers electric shocks; may chain to other targets.

tags.name: Loud
tags.definition: Produces loud noise; may attract unwanted attention.

tags.name: Movement
tags.definition: An action that changes the user's position in space.

tags.name: Ongoing
tags.definition: The effect lasts over multiple turns or requires upkeep.

tags.name: Off-Guard
tags.definition: Guard value is 0. This condition makes vulnerable to abilities that target Off-Guard targets.

tags.name: Passive
tags.definition: Always active; does not require activation.

tags.name: Poisoned
tags.definition: Applies toxic effects that deal damage over time.
interactions: Affected by Constitution and Detox talents

tags.name: Ranged
tags.definition: An action performed at a distance, requiring line of sight and limited by maximum range.
interactions: Triggers Opportunity Attacks when used too close

tags.name: Reaction
tags.definition: Can be used outside your turn in response to a trigger.
interactions: Usually limited to once per round

tags.name: Risky
tags.definition: Involves a higher number of Risk Dice or increased danger.

tags.name: Social
tags.definition: The art of words and presence — persuading, deceiving, intimidating, or inspiring through human interaction.
tags.notes: Core mechanical tag. Often used to determine legality of abilities.

tags.name: Solar
tags.definition: No description available.
tags.notes: Core mechanical tag. Often used to determine legality of abilities.

tags.name: Strike
tags.definition: A direct blow with weapons or bare hands against a target.

tags.name: Summon
tags.definition: Creates creatures or constructs to fight or assist you.
interactions: Summons act on your turn or autonomously

tags.name: Support
tags.definition: An action intended to benefit or assist another being.
interactions: Can increase Action Dice of allies

tags.name: Toxic
tags.definition: Applies toxic effects that deal damage over time.
interactions: Affected by Constitution and Detox talents

tags.name: Triggered
tags.definition: Activates only when a specific condition is met.
interactions: Can be part of a chain reaction
